titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain chemicals.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1997, the duty on: (1) 6-chloro-2-amino toluene; (2) 6-chloro-ortho-toluidine; (3) 3-chloro-2-methyl aniline benzenamine; and (4) 3-chloro-2-methyl.
